attributes.action: The Prime Minister of the United Kingdom should resign immediately.
attributes.background: Boris Johnson has been given a fixed penalty notice for attending an illegal party during lockdown. He has lied to the Commons by making the unbelievable statement that he didn't think it was a party. Parliament should call a confidence motion on him or if he still has integrity he should resign.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
